You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &ascr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ascr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D49C.
  * `&ascr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B6.
